title: Social security benefits: right or privilege?
creator_credit: Roger Ley, David Gardner and Centre for Study of Higher Education, University of Melbourne
brief_description: Outlines the work of a field officer with the Commonwealth Department of Social Security. Shows how the evidence found by the field officer can determine the continuation or cessation of a benefit. See also “Branda’s appeal”.
creator_credit_for_label: Roger Ley, David Gardner and Centre for Study of Higher Education, University of Melbourne
